languages.text: "Теперь, видимо, пора исполнить мою часть сделки и удалить мыслееда из твоего тела... Но даже если бы я попытался, вряд ли ты бы это пережил{mf||а}. Я — боец, а не кромсатель плоти. Я тебе соврал, чтобы заставить шевелиться. Так живут на шпилях, знаешь ли".

traits.locale_text: "Теперь, видимо, пора исполнить мою часть сделки и удалить мыслееда из твоего тела... Но даже если бы я попытался, вряд ли ты бы это пережил{mf||а}. Я — боец, а не кромсатель плоти. Я тебе соврал, чтобы заставить шевелиться. Так живут на шпилях, знаешь ли".
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Now is when I should hold up my end of the deal and remove the mind maggot from your body... But even if I tried to, I doubt you'd survive. I'm a fighter, not a hacker of flesh. I lied to go to get you to act fast. That's just life in the spires, you see."
languages.original_text: "Теперь, видимо, пора исполнить мою часть сделки и удалить мыслееда из твоего тела... Но даже если бы я попытался, вряд ли ты бы это пережил{mf||а}. Я — боец, а не кромсатель плоти. Я тебе соврал, чтобы заставить шевелиться. Так живут на шпилях, знаешь ли".

traits.locale_text: "Now is when I should hold up my end of the deal and remove the mind maggot from your body... But even if I tried to, I doubt you'd survive. I'm a fighter, not a hacker of flesh. I lied to go to get you to act fast. That's just life in the spires, you see."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Now is when I should hold up my end of the deal and remove the mind maggot from your body... But even if I tried to, I doubt you'd survive. I'm a fighter, not a hacker of flesh. I lied to go to get you to act fast. That's just life in the spires, you see."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Now is when I should hold up my end of the deal and remove the mind maggot from your body... But even if I tried to, I doubt you'd survive. I'm a fighter, not a hacker of flesh. I lied to go to get you to act fast. That's just life in the spires, you see."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Now is when I should hold up my end of the deal and remove the mind maggot from your body... But even if I tried to, I doubt you'd survive. I'm a fighter, not a hacker of flesh. I lied to go to get you to act fast. That's just life in the spires, you see."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “现在，轮到我兑现我的诺言了。我要从你的身体中取出灵蛆……但就算我尽我所能，你也未必能活得下来。我是个战士，不是血肉的雕刻师。我之前对你撒了谎，只是希望你能动作快点。不过如你所见，尖塔里的生活就是这样。”
languages.original_text: "Now is when I should hold up my end of the deal and remove the mind maggot from your body... But even if I tried to, I doubt you'd survive. I'm a fighter, not a hacker of flesh. I lied to go to get you to act fast. That's just life in the spires, you see."

traits.locale_text: “现在，轮到我兑现我的诺言了。我要从你的身体中取出灵蛆……但就算我尽我所能，你也未必能活得下来。我是个战士，不是血肉的雕刻师。我之前对你撒了谎，只是希望你能动作快点。不过如你所见，尖塔里的生活就是这样。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Ahora me correspondería cumplir mi parte del trato y extraerte el gusano mental... pero aunque lo hiciera dudo que fueras a sobrevivir. Soy guerrero, no matasanos. Mentí para que te dieras prisa. Así son las cosas en las torres, ¿sabes?».
languages.original_text: "Now is when I should hold up my end of the deal and remove the mind maggot from your body... But even if I tried to, I doubt you'd survive. I'm a fighter, not a hacker of flesh. I lied to go to get you to act fast. That's just life in the spires, you see."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora me correspondería cumplir mi parte del trato y extraerte el gusano mental... pero aunque lo hiciera dudo que fueras a sobrevivir. Soy guerrero, no matasanos. Mentí para que te dieras prisa. Así son las cosas en las torres, ¿sabes?».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「首を届けたからにはこちらも約束を守り、貴様の身体からマゴットを取り除くべきだが…恐らく貴様はその過程で死ぬ。私は医者ではなく戦士だ。貴様にさっさと仕事をこなしてもらうために少々嘘をついた。尖塔ではこれが当たり前だ」
languages.original_text: "Now is when I should hold up my end of the deal and remove the mind maggot from your body... But even if I tried to, I doubt you'd survive. I'm a fighter, not a hacker of flesh. I lied to go to get you to act fast. That's just life in the spires, you see."

traits.locale_text: 「首を届けたからにはこちらも約束を守り、貴様の身体からマゴットを取り除くべきだが…恐らく貴様はその過程で死ぬ。私は医者ではなく戦士だ。貴様にさっさと仕事をこなしてもらうために少々嘘をついた。尖塔ではこれが当たり前だ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Nun sollte ich meinen Teil der Abmachung einhalten und den Hirnwurm aus Eurem Körper entfernen ... Doch selbst, wenn ich es versuchen würde, würdet Ihr wohl nicht überleben. Ich bin ein Kämpfer, kein Fleischhacker. Ich habe gelogen, damit Ihr schnell handelt. So ist das Leben in den Türmen einfach."
languages.original_text: "Now is when I should hold up my end of the deal and remove the mind maggot from your body... But even if I tried to, I doubt you'd survive. I'm a fighter, not a hacker of flesh. I lied to go to get you to act fast. That's just life in the spires, you see."

traits.locale_text: "Nun sollte ich meinen Teil der Abmachung einhalten und den Hirnwurm aus Eurem Körper entfernen ... Doch selbst, wenn ich es versuchen würde, würdet Ihr wohl nicht überleben. Ich bin ein Kämpfer, kein Fleischhacker. Ich habe gelogen, damit Ihr schnell handelt. So ist das Leben in den Türmen einfach."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Et donc, je suis maintenant censé respecter ma part du marché en extrayant le ver cérébral de votre corps... mais même si je voulais bien essayer, je doute fort que vous y surviviez. Je suis un combattant, pas un charcuteur de chair. J'ai menti pour vous pousser à agir vite, ce qui n'a rien d'inhabituel dans les tours. »
languages.original_text: "Now is when I should hold up my end of the deal and remove the mind maggot from your body... But even if I tried to, I doubt you'd survive. I'm a fighter, not a hacker of flesh. I lied to go to get you to act fast. That's just life in the spires, you see."

traits.locale_text: « Et donc, je suis maintenant censé respecter ma part du marché en extrayant le ver cérébral de votre corps... mais même si je voulais bien essayer, je doute fort que vous y surviviez. Je suis un combattant, pas un charcuteur de chair. J'ai menti pour vous pousser à agir vite, ce qui n'a rien d'inhabituel dans les tours. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Anlaşmamıza uyup zihin kurdunu bedeninden sökmek isterdim ama... Yapsam da sağ kalacağını sanmıyorum. Ben cerrah değil, dövüşçüyüm. Elini çabuk tutasın diye yalan söyledim. Kulelerde işler böyle yürüyor."
languages.original_text: "Now is when I should hold up my end of the deal and remove the mind maggot from your body... But even if I tried to, I doubt you'd survive. I'm a fighter, not a hacker of flesh. I lied to go to get you to act fast. That's just life in the spires, you see."

traits.locale_text: "Anlaşmamıza uyup zihin kurdunu bedeninden sökmek isterdim ama... Denesem de sağ çıkacağını sanmıyorum. Savaşçıyım ben, cerrah falan değil. Sen elini çabuk tutasın diye yalan söyledim sadece. Kulelerde hayat böyle işliyor, anlarsın ya."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
